alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 5:23PM PDT until April 21 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT THURSDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Periods of snow above 5000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Trinity County. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult over Scott Mountain Summit on Highway 3. Snow removal operations do not occur at night at that pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
